committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Housing Act of 1949 to assure borrowers of the right to employ qualified attorneys of their choice in performing necessary legal services in connection with loans under that title.

summary.text: Accords borrowers the right to employ qualified attorneys of their choice in performing necessary legal services in connection with loans under title V of the Housing Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to amend title V of the Housing Act of 1949 to assure borrowers of the right to employ qualified attorneys of their choice in performing necessary legal services in connection with loans under that title.
